name: Dropchat
author: Dropchat

sections.description:
This WordPress plugin integrates a custom chatbot, enabling handling of customer support, lead generation, visitor engagement, and more on your website.

With this plugin, you can embed your Dropchat chatbot into your WordPress website and implement a chat bubble that will appear in the lower right corner of the website.

This plugin utilizes Dropchat services to deploy a pre-trained chatbot on your website, leveraging the data you’ve uploaded to the Dropchat application.

For more information on privacy and terms of service, please refer to our dedicated web pages on these topics.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin directly through the WordPress plugins screen.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I integrate the chatbot?

  1. Install this plugin on your WordPress website.
  2. Copy your Chatbot ID from Dropchat manage chatbot tab.
  3. Navigate to the “Dropchat Options” tab under the “Settings” menu in the sidebar of your WordPress dashboard.
  4. Paste your Chatbot ID into the designated field.
  5. Click “Save Changes”.
  6. Refresh your website to see the chatbot at the bottom right corner.

short_description: Embed Dropchat's chatbot seamlessly on your WordPress site for enhanced customer support and engagement.
